titles.title: Rural Heritage Conservation Extension Act of 2011
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the special rule for contributions of qualified conservation contributions.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S686-687)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 2/14/2011--Introduced. Rural Heritage Conservation Extension Act of 2011- Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the tax deduction for charitable contributions by individuals and corporations of real property interests for conservation purposes.
